main_definition: The act of cleaning dishes or plates used in a kitchen, as well as other meanings related to meals and cooking.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cleaning the eating utensils after use
meanings_and_examples.example: Every evening, Maria spends an hour washing dishes in her kitchen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A meal or set of food items prepared and served together
meanings_and_examples.example: For dinner, we had a delicious plate of pasta with garlic bread as the main course.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To deal with or handle in an unfavorable way; to treat harshly or dismissively
meanings_and_examples.example: After her failure at the interview, she felt like he was throwing dishes at her comments.
